channel.title: How do i change the prices of my slayer shop?
channel.description: HELP! all of my slayer shop items are at the price of 0 slayer pts

item.title: How do i change the prices of my slayer shop?
item.dc:creator: @cdaveeez cdaveeez
item.description:
@cdaveeez wrote:

look for the items under shops.java (ithink)

you will see something like this at some point

return 40; case 6745: return 80; case 6746: return 140;

the cases are you item ID, the return is the cost in points.

these are found under

public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) { switch (id) {
  • make sure there isnt another shop with the same item in, obviously.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the prices of my slayer shop?
